page.title: Hitachi H8/500 Processor Options
page.subtitle: How would you like the Hitachi H8/500 processor module to analyze the input file?

checkbox.caption: Disassemble mixed size instructions
checkbox.help:
According to the documentation, instructions like
cmp:g.b #1:16, @0x222:16
are not allowed. The correct instruction is:
cmp:g.b #1:8, @0x222:16
The size of the first operand should agree with the size of the instruction. (exception mov:g)
